name: Shroffs Foundation Trust
briefDescription: Shroffs Foundation Trust (SFT), an NGO working in the development field ensuring community development in an holistic manner, was established in 1980 to improve lives of impoverished communities through various social welfare projects. The trust have interwoven the philosophy of building a better society. Founding principles of SEVA, SADBHAV and VIKAS and strong devotion to the ideology of Sahaviryam i.e. strength of togetherness, in the deepest sense, defines the culture of Shroff family. Thought of Unity in Community is what drives us towards fulfilment of life of those who have been marginalized and transform them from deprivation to dignity.SFT has implemented various developmental programs related to water and soil conservation, agriculture, health, education, literacy, animal husbandry and income generation activities in about more than 500 villages of Vadodara, Chhotaudepur and Kachchh  district.The trust operates out of four centers, Chhota Udepur, Pavi-Jetpur, Ekalbara and Banni with its head quarters in Kalali, Vadodara, Gujarat.
